rules.natural: Given that the scientific panel studies permafrost thaw, it predicts a methane spike.

Should the scientific panel predict a methane spike, then, under the condition that a heatwave does not trigger a public health emergency and a heatwave does not occur, the president declares a federal disaster.
The bank offering a green mortgage implies that a heatwave occurs.
If the bank offers a sustainability loan, then a heatwave follows.
Provided that the pension fund invests in renewable energy, the project qualifies for a tax incentive.
Either the pension fund invests in renewable energy, or the pension fund invests in carbon capture.
If the pension fund invests in carbon capture, then it is the case that the bank offers a green mortgage or the bank offers a sustainability loan.
Whenever the project qualifies for a tax incentive, it receives certification.
Provided that the project creates green jobs, the bank offers a green mortgage or it offers a sustainability loan.
Given that the regulator monitors the carbon market, then if the project receives certification, it creates green jobs.
Either sea-level rise causes coastal flooding, or the governing body implements a carbon tax, or a heatwave occurs.
Either the administration deregulates the carbon market, or the regulator monitors it.
The occurrence of a polar vortex entails the occurrence of a heatwave.
A polar vortex occurs, or extreme cold impacts the energy grid.
If extreme cold impacts the energy grid, then the governor requests federal assistance.
The region experiencing a blackout implies that a heatwave occurs.
The utility activating backup generators necessitates that the region experiences a blackout.
Under the condition that the governor requests federal assistance, FEMA deploys emergency crews.
If the opposition party criticizes the response, then should FEMA deploy emergency crews, the utility activates backup generators.
Either the opposition party criticizes the response, or it praises the response.
Provided that the opposition party praises the response, then if FEMA deploys emergency crews, the utility activates backup generators.
If a climate scientist observes a jet stream shift, then, under the condition that a heatwave does not occur, the agriculture sector suffers crop loss.
The journal publishing a jet stream study implies that either a climate skeptic denies the jet stream shift or a climate scientist observes it.
Should peer review accept the jet stream study, then it rejects the jet stream study.
The legislature vetoing the seawall program implies that the government does not enact the seawall program.

rules.prover9_expression: (issues(insurance_industry, climate_warning) | (-(causes(sea_level_rise, coastal_flooding) -> evacuates(government, coastal_community)) -> vetoes(legislature, seawall_program)))
rules.natural: Either the insurance industry issues a climate warning, or if it is not the case that sea-level rise causing coastal flooding leads the government to evacuate the coastal community, then the legislature vetoes the seawall program.
Congress passing the green bond bill implies that the insurance industry does not issue a climate warning.
In the event that it is not the case that sea-level rise causing coastal flooding implies the government evacuates the coastal community, the government enacts the seawall program.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(replicates(research_team, jet_stream_study) -> (denies(climate_skeptic, jet_stream_shift) | observes(climate_scientist, jet_stream_shift))) -> accepts(peer_review, jet_stream_study))
rules.natural: Under the condition that it is false that the research team replicating the jet stream study implies that either a climate skeptic denies the jet stream shift or a climate scientist observes it, peer review accepts the jet stream study.
Should a heatwave not occur, then the agriculture sector does not suffer crop loss.
